abstract: AT&T‘s Rick Moore said the company is open to Italian partners in its bid for Telecom Italia Mr. Moore, AT&T’s development head, told an Italian newspaper Corriere della Sera, “We are absolutely ready to take into consideration the interests of Italian industrial and financial partners.”
lead_paragraph: AT&T‘s Rick Moore said the company is open to Italian partners in its bid for Telecom Italia Mr. Moore, AT&T’s development head, told an Italian newspaper Corriere della Sera, “We are absolutely ready to take into consideration the interests of Italian industrial and financial partners.”

headline.main: AT&T Is Open to Partners in Telecom Italia Deal
